result.html: faoiseamh ó stealladh na gréineRelief from the burning sun.
result.ponchtml: faoiseaṁ ó steallaḋ na gréineRelief from the burning sun.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: She made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ga: lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.orig: lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.html: lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ponchtml: lig sí osna faoisiṁ nuair a ċonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.

result.eng: Doctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ga: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.orig: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.html: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ponchtml: tugann doċtúirí cógas dóiḃ a ṫugann faoiseaṁ dóiḃ aċ naċ leiġeasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
